translation: The origin and destruction of beings have been heard in detail from You, O lotus-eyed Lord, and also Your inexhaustible greatness.
commentary: 11.2 Bhavapyau the origin and the dissolution? Hi indeed? of beings of beings? Shrutau hav been heard? in detail in detail? Maya by me? from you from Thee? Lotus-eyed O lotuseyed? Mahatmyam greatness? Even also? f and? infinitive inexhaustible.Commentary Kamalapatraksha Lotuseyed or having eyes like lotuspetals. Kamalapatra also means knowledge of the Self. He who can be obtained by knowledge of the Self is Kamalapatraksha.
